page.title: 16Living at Fox Lodge (1)
page.content: Mr.and Mrs.Kay live at{Fox Lodge,}a converted estate workers cottage near Moulton Grange, about 1Km.to the north east of{Pitsford}village. Mr.Kay works for Barclaycard and his wife is a teacher. Both travel daily into Northampton by car. There are about ten houses in the tiny community and most people commute into Northampton. One neighbour, Mr.Roger Thom, runs a vetinary suppliers from his home. Mrs.Kay enjoys the{peaceful isolation of the community and says it is perfect for a quiet life due to the absence of through traffic or other modern disturbances.The only event of note in recent months has been the unexplained loss of a beehive! The local shop is expensive so Mrs.Kay travels to Kingsthorpe to shop at the Waitrose supermarket each week. (more p.17)
